sentence.Network_en: The inspector dutifully recorded the date in a large red book.
sentence.Network_cn: 检查员很尽职地在一本大红册子上记下了日期。

sentence.Network_en: "No movies of me getting out of the pool, boys." They dutifully lowered their cameras.
sentence.Network_cn: “小伙子们，不要拍摄我从泳池出来的画面。”他们便乖乖地把摄像机放下了。

sentence.Network_en: 'Of course we can't afford to take chances,'agreed Winston dutifully.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 当然啦,我们不能抱侥幸心理, ” 温斯顿顺从地同意.

list.abs: Perhaps a your nonchalant smile , I dutifully arrive at side you ., 也许你不经意的一个微笑 , 我就义无反顾地来到你身边.
I dutifully admit that i have misjudged your character我郑重地承认我错看你了
His cogitations were dutifully recorded in his daybook ., 他把自己的思想忠实地记录在了自己的日记中.
cyclists dutifully raise their arm when they want to make a turn , and drivers communicate by hand signs , nods and waving .当骑车的人想要转弯的时候，他们会举起他们的手臂示意。司机通过手势、点头和挥手等方式交流。
respect deeply 十分尊敬respect dutifully 恭敬地尊重respect fully 完全尊重

entry.def: If you say that someone is dutiful, you mean that they do everything that they are expected to do.

example.ex: The days of the dutiful wife, who sacrifices her career for her husband, are over.
example.tran: 贤妻为了丈夫而牺牲自己事业的时代已经结束了。

means.word_mean: 1. out of a sense of duty; in a dutiful manner;

sentences.sentence: "he dutifully visited his mother every Sunday"

auth_sentence.content: Bob Diamond dutifully received his spanking from MPs yesterday.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bob Diamond dutifully received his spanking from MPs yesterday.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bob Diamond dutifully received his spanking from MPs yesterday.

auth_sentence.content: The future king dutifully did as he was told.
auth_sentence.res_content: The future king dutifully did as he was told.

auth_sentence.content: He had dutifully attended every session for two days.
